attributes.action: Dual the A11 Norwich to Cambridge ASAP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need and to maintain and improve road and travel links from Norwich (and Norfolk) to rest of the nation.

The majority of the A11 has undergone dualling.  However the few mile stretch around Elvedon is still the thorn in the side of network.

We need to promote and reinforce the need for better transport links, for business, leisure and general sanity for those of us that travel the A11 daily.  Lets face it, the rail link is pretty poor at the moment and I'm sure I'm not alone in saying that I would be happy to pay £1 a day for a vastly improved A11.
